name: Run Kitty Run: A Puzzle Maze Game
name_original: Run Kitty Run: A Puzzle Maze Game
description:
Run Kitty Run
A Puzzle Maze Game

Korner Games' version of Theseus vs. Minotaur puzzle

Players take control of a cat that tries its hardest to get away from a playful dog. Move the cat by swiping to any unblocked direction. The level is cleared when the cat reaches the exit before the dog reaches the cat. Beware though: after each move made by the cat, the dog makes two to get closer.

----

Our very first game "Run Kitty Run" is now available on Google Play Store. Designed and developed with love within 1 month, this is a game that tests your brains. Can you beat the first 25 levels?

Download and play now!
Run Kitty Run - Apps on Google Play
